item.title: Project file format
item.description: Project file format The project file format is basically a normal Squeak project file which can be read by standard Squeak tools. Most of the layers are a consequence of the history of Squeak. Project file structure of an Etoys project file As you can see in the figure the project file consists mainly of an image segment. This image segment is the most important part of the project file.
